works.name: Aleksander Fret
works.description: Final project of Front-End Web Developer Nanodegree (Udacity, Google). Focused mainly on React and using API's, but engages many other skills like: Redux, ES6, service workers, accessibility, RWD.

works.name: Amusement Parks
works.description: Final project of Front-End Web Developer Nanodegree (Udacity, Google). Focused mainly on React and using API's, but engages many other skills like: Redux, ES6, service workers, accessibility, RWD.

works.name: Arcade Game
works.description: This arcade game is focused on OOP with ES6 (especially encapsulation and inheritance). It was created in the scope of Front-End Web Developer Nanodegree (Udacity, Google).

works.name: Memory Game
works.description: Memory game created in the scope of Front-End Web Developer Nanodegree (Udacity, Google). It is enhanced with confguration options (difficulty level, appearance).

works.name: Pixel Art Maker
works.description: This graphic application was created in the scope of Front-End Web Developer Nanodegree (Udacity, Google). It provides various functionalities to draw on grid-based canvas.

works.name: Wilmat website
works.description: The website for the Wilmat company, which represents the sector of the low voltage installations.

works.name: Artist website
works.description: The website made for Ewa Fret, the artist, in order to promote her works, mainly ilustrations and handicrafts.

works.name: Psychoterapist website
works.description: The website created for Emilia Fret, the psychotherapist specializing especially in addiction therapy.
